Subscribe to be notified when a new oracle data is stored

```graphql
oracleUpdate: OracleData
```


### Type

#### [`OracleData`](/build/api/schema/objects/oracle-data) <Badge class="secondary" text="object"/>
> [OracleData] represents an oracle data.
>
